wipe_slider.description: Wipe clean the slider to ensure it works smoothly.

press_slider.description: Press the slider to initiate the coffee making process.

rotate_rotor.description: Rotate the rotor to grind the coffee beans.

clean_rotor.description: Clean the rotor to ensure it works properly.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to maintain hygiene.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the slider, rotor and the machine body.

operate_coffee_machine.description: Operate the coffee machine by pressing the slider and rotating the rotor.
